metadata.title: Made in USA, Heavy Weight GI Watch Cap Winter Wool Cuff Folded Beanie Hat
features: Soft, Warm and Perfect for Winter
Made with Good Quality Thick Material
Available in Black, Navy and Olive
description: Our Made in USA, Heavy Weight Winter Wool Beanie Hat with Cuff is perfect for any outdoor occasion. This item is made in the USA, using high quality materials to give you the best feeling and comfort when wearing it. Take this on your next snow trip and stay warm during the cold temperatures. This beanie will make a great Holiday or Birthday gift. 100% Acrylic. Available in 3 colors. One size fits most.
